question:
Write a letter to your neighbor.in your letter
. Describe the problem
. Say how long it has been a problem
.  Explain what action you want the neighbor to takes
Write atleast 150 words
text: I am writing to draw your attention to the excessive noise that comes from your apartment. This has become very intolerable and unpleasant, making it almost impossible for me to concentrate on my work.

For 3 months now, you have stayed up almost all night playing your very loud music with utter disregard for the neighborhood and my own health.this has turned out to be a major issue. Your incessantly loud music have become a sleep deprivation therapy for me and have also landed me a place at the National Otological centre( centre for ear problems).I have complained about it severally but you have remained adamant and unrepentant about it.
I urge you to do something about this immediately.

I would suggest that you  reduce the volume of your sound system and put the interest of others  ahead of yours.An ulternative line of action will be to get a sound-proof for your accommodation.Athough this might cost an arm and a leg.
I hope this issue can be resolved amicably as I plan to take civil actions if this is not addressed.
